attributes.action: Creation of new billericay and hutton  local forest and ponds nature reserve and hutton  along rayleigh road
attributes.additional_details:
The aim of this petition is get govemrnent to create new local forest nature reserve between billericay and hutton along rayleigh road with additional ponds created for bird life and insects. building visitors centre with eudcational facilities and cafe. introduction of species on reserve like
European Beaver
Native breeds of cattle or sheep
European Bittern
European Stork
European Red Squrrel
European Dormice
European Badgers
European Roe deer
European Tarpan Wild horses
European Spoonn bill
European Glow worms
European Tree frogs
European Pool frog
